sections.heading: doc_evergreen
sections.prompt: Write a compelling introduction to doc_evergreen. Explain that it's an AI-powered documentation generator that uses templates to maintain docs as code evolves. Highlight the key value: documentation stays in sync with code automatically. Include a brief tagline or description that captures the essence. Keep it punchy and engaging (2-3 paragraphs max).

sections.heading: Features
sections.prompt: List the key features of doc_evergreen in a bulleted format. Include: template-based generation, change preview with diff, iterative refinement, progress feedback, source specification per section, glob pattern support, comprehensive error messages. For each feature, add a one-line explanation of the benefit.

sections.heading: Quick Start
sections.prompt: Create a quick start guide that gets users productive in 5 minutes. Include: (1) Installation command, (2) Create a simple template (show minimal example), (3) Run regen-doc command, (4) Review and approve changes. Each step should be copy-pasteable. Focus on speed to first success.

sections.heading: How It Works
sections.prompt: Explain the regeneration workflow in clear steps: (1) Define template with sections and prompts, (2) Specify source files per section, (3) Run regen-doc to generate, (4) Review diff showing what changed, (5) Approve or reject changes, (6) Optionally iterate to refine. Include a simple diagram or flow using text/markdown if helpful.

sections.heading: Template Structure
sections.prompt: Show the template JSON structure with a complete example. Explain each field (title, output, sections, heading, prompt, sources). The example should be realistic but simple - something users can immediately understand and adapt.

sections.heading: Examples
sections.prompt: Describe the example templates available in the examples/ and templates/ directories. For each example, provide: (1) Filename, (2) What it demonstrates, (3) When to use it as a starting point. Include links to the actual files.

sections.heading: Testing
sections.prompt: Explain how to run tests for doc_evergreen. Include: (1) Command to run all tests, (2) Command to run specific test files, (3) What the tests cover. Mention test-driven development approach and test coverage.

sections.heading: Development
sections.prompt: Provide development setup instructions. Include: (1) How to set up development environment, (2) Running tests and checks, (3) Contributing guidelines (if applicable), (4) Project structure overview. Keep it focused on what developers need to know.

sections.heading: Documentation
sections.prompt: List all available documentation with links and descriptions. Include: TEMPLATES.md (template creation guide), examples/ (example templates), ai_working/doc_evergreen/sprints/ (sprint planning docs). For each doc, explain what users will find there and when they should read it.
